summary: "The Da Vinci Code" is a popular mystery book by Dan Brown. It follows experts Robert Langdon and Sophie Neveu as they uncover a secret about Jesus and Mary Magdalene after a murder in the Louvre Museum. The story suggests that Jesus and Mary had a child, and their descendants are the Merovingian kings of France. This idea is taken from other books and theories. The novel has sold millions of copies but has also been criticized for its historical mistakes and for upsetting some Christian groups. It was later made into a movie.
title: The Da Vinci Code
